page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT
page.content: In Beadnell village and adjoining farms are 100 workers in regular employment,some having to travel. In agriculture,18 Fishing,10 Self-Employed Builders,2 Self-Employed Joiners,2 School teachers,2 Quarry workers,3 Garage & Coach hire,5 Shops,ll Pubs & Hotels,14 Chip shop,2 Air traffic controllers,2 Other employment,bakers van,lorry driver,insurance,warden,stone mason,nurse,chef,cobbler,electrician, landscape gardener,painter,joiner, telephone engineer,others in business Seasonal workers in hotels,pubs,shops, caravan and camp sites.
